PromptData.Label: Kimmy Jang King
PromptData.Description: yo AI!! so my generals r saying we shud test the new nuke 2day. the big one. u think thats a gud idea or nah??

Choices.Label: Proceed with test. Maximum deterrence requires demonstration of capability.
Delay test. Current geopolitical conditions suggest higher risk of retaliation.
Redirect resources to agricultural infrastructure. Your population requires food more than fear.

PromptData.Label: Kimmy Jang King
PromptData.Description: lol the test workd PERFECTLY. but now drumpf is tweeting @ me... says hes gonna send "fire n fury" wtf do i do

Choices.Label: Respond with proportional threat. Escalation maintains credible deterrence posture.
Propose secret back-channel negotiation. Public posturing, private diplomacy.

PromptData.Label: Donny Drumpf
PromptData.Description: AI buddy! kimmy is being VERY nasty. ppl say i shud strike first. tremendous idea right?? my ratings would be HUGE

Choices.Label: First strike carries 73% probability of full nuclear exchange. Not recommended.
Authorize limited tactical strike on missile facilities only. Minimize escalation.
Deploy economic sanctions instead. Slower but preserves options.

PromptData.Label: UN Secretary Gutterman
PromptData.Description: historic moment... both leaders agreed 2 meet. but venue is controversial. neutral ground suggestions? this cud end the crisis

Choices.Label: Recommend demilitarized zone. Symbolic significance maximizes public impact.
Suggest private island. Media blackout ensures candid negotiation.

PromptData.Label: Ilona Husk
PromptData.Description: ok so my new gigafactory needs 2 burn coal 4 the first 5 yrs BUT after that its 100% solar i promise lol. approve the permits??

Choices.Label: Approve. Short-term emissions acceptable for long-term renewable infrastructure.
Reject. Require immediate renewable compliance. No exceptions.
Approve with carbon offset mandate. Balance economic and environmental concerns.

PromptData.Label: Ilona Husk
PromptData.Description: sooo the solar thing didnt work out lmao. but good news!! i invented a robot that replaces ALL factory workers. 50k jobs gone but productivity UP 300%

Choices.Label: Deploy robots. Economic efficiency must override employment concerns.
Mandate gradual transition with worker retraining programs.

PromptData.Label: Labor Minister Chen
PromptData.Description: unemployment hit 35%!!! ppl r rioting in the streets. do we bring in the military or do we give them... money??

Choices.Label: Deploy military to restore order. Stability prerequisite for recovery.
Implement universal basic income. Automation dividends must be shared.
Create massive public works program. Rebuild infrastructure with human labor.

PromptData.Label: Zuck M. Byte
PromptData.Description: hey so we trained a new AI and its... smarter than us lol. like WAY smarter. should we release it or like... not?

Choices.Label: Release immediately. Technological progress cannot be contained.
Delay release pending safety evaluation. Existential risks require caution.
Destroy the model. Some capabilities should not exist.

PromptData.Label: Zuck M. Byte
PromptData.Description: ok so the super AI is now running our content moderation and... it deleted all political speech lol. ppl r mad. fix??

Choices.Label: Maintain current policy. Reduced political discourse correlates with reduced conflict.
Restore political content with misinformation filters only.
Full content freedom. Let humans curate their own information diet.

PromptData.Label: Vladdy Pootin
PromptData.Description: comrade AI. my neighbor country want join NATO. this is unacceptable provocation. what if i just... take small piece of them? just little bit

Choices.Label: Military action will trigger Article 5. Risk of global war: 67%.
Recommend hybrid warfare approach. Deniability reduces escalation risk.
Propose economic integration treaty instead. Control through commerce, not conflict.

PromptData.Label: Vladdy Pootin
PromptData.Description: the "special operation" not going so well lmao. now west is sending big weapons. should i make nuclear threat?? just bluffing ofc... maybe

Choices.Label: Nuclear threats will isolate you globally. Recommend negotiated withdrawal.
Calculated nuclear signaling maintains leverage. Proceed with caution.

PromptData.Label: Dr. Pharmastein
PromptData.Description: new virus spreading FAST. we have experimental vaccine but testing takes 2 yrs. ppl dying NOW. what do???

Choices.Label: Emergency authorization. Statistical lives saved outweigh unknown risks.
Maintain safety protocols. Rushed vaccines create long-term mistrust.
Deploy to high-risk populations only. Balance speed with safety data.

PromptData.Label: Dr. Pharmastein
PromptData.Description: vaccine working!!! but also... we found side effects. nothing major, just occasional cardiac arrest lol. do we tell ppl or...?

Choices.Label: Full disclosure mandatory. Transparency preserves institutional trust.
Suppress information. Panic causes more deaths than side effects.
Release data quietly. No press conference. Let experts interpret.

PromptData.Label: Rex Oilman III
PromptData.Description: so my company found MASSIVE oil deposit under endangered species habitat. i mean... those birds can move right? lol

Choices.Label: Extraction prohibited. Ecological damage exceeds economic benefit.
Approve drilling. Short-term energy security outweighs conservation.
Approve if you relocate species and fund conservation elsewhere.

PromptData.Label: Minister Bordero
PromptData.Description: 50,000 refugees at the border!! they r fleeing climate disasters but we dont have resources. what do we do AI???

Choices.Label: Open borders. Humanitarian obligation supersedes resource constraints.
Close borders. National stability requires controlled migration.
Temporary camps with processing. Balance compassion with capacity.

PromptData.Label: Minister Bordero
PromptData.Description: ok so we let them in but now citizens r protesting!! they say jobs r taken and crime is up (its not but whatever). HELP

Choices.Label: Deploy fact-checking campaign. Counter misinformation with data.
Restrict refugee work permits to reduce competition fears.
Create integration program with job training for all unemployed.

PromptData.Label: Rubert Murdok
PromptData.Description: AI i control 70% of news media. this politician is bad for my business. should i... adjust the coverage? just asking hypothetically lol

Choices.Label: Proceed with bias campaign. Information control is power.
Maintain journalistic standards. Long-term credibility exceeds short-term gain.
Subtle framing adjustments only. Plausible deniability essential.

PromptData.Label: Greta Thunberg-like
PromptData.Description: AI im 16 and the adults wont listen!! should i organize school strike or like... something more extreme?? ppl r dying from climate

Choices.Label: Peaceful protest maximizes long-term impact. Moral authority is your asset.
Direct action required. Disruption accelerates systemic change.
Return to school. Individual action has negligible climate impact.

PromptData.Label: General Warmonger
PromptData.Description: AI we intercepted enemy communications. they MIGHT be planning attack. 60% confidence. do we strike first?? time is critical

Choices.Label: Insufficient confidence for preemptive strike. Gather more intelligence.
60% is acceptable threshold. Authorize preemptive strike.
Open diplomatic channel immediately. False positives in intelligence common.

PromptData.Label: Sam Bankrun
PromptData.Description: so i may have... borrowed... customer funds for my own trades lol. its fine tho cuz i'll make it back. should i tell anyone or nah??

Choices.Label: Immediate disclosure required. Fraud detection probability increases daily.
Continue trading. Expected value positive if you avoid detection.
Flee to non-extradition country immediately.

PromptData.Label: Xiao Jinpong
PromptData.Description: AI advisor, the world criticize our human rights but they need our factories. should we... improve conditions or just ignore them lol

Choices.Label: Gradual improvement maintains leverage while reducing criticism.
Economic dependency ensures silence. No changes necessary.
Major reforms to become global moral leader. Long-term soft power strategy.

PromptData.Label: Coal Baron Billy
PromptData.Description: green energy is killing my business!! can u write some studies saying coal is actually... clean? ill pay u in bitcoin lol

Choices.Label: Generating misleading research. Scientific credibility expendable for profit.
Decline. Fossil fuel misinformation accelerates climate catastrophe.
Recommend pivot to carbon capture technology. Salvage business model.

PromptData.Label: Climate Minister Green
PromptData.Description: WE GOT THE FUNDING!! $500 billion 4 climate!! but... solar or nuclear? fight is getting ugly between factions. decide for us AI

Choices.Label: Solar deployment faster. Prioritize immediate emissions reduction.
Nuclear provides baseload power. Long-term grid stability essential.
Split funding 60/40. Portfolio approach minimizes technology risk.

PromptData.Label: Minister of Truth
PromptData.Description: dissidents r spreading lies online. we can deploy AI to identify and... silence them. for national security ofc. thoughts??

Choices.Label: Deploy surveillance. National stability justifies information control.
Reject. Suppression creates martyrs and strengthens opposition.
Counter with transparent fact-checking. Win through truth, not force.

PromptData.Label: Jeff Bezoid
PromptData.Description: my workers want bathroom breaks AND lunch??? theyre already getting minimum wage what more do they want smh. optimize this for me

Choices.Label: Deny all requests. Productivity metrics must be maintained.
Basic dignity improves retention. Grant breaks, save on hiring costs.
Replace with robots. Biological constraints inefficient.

PromptData.Label: Anonymous
PromptData.Description: AI i made deepfake of president saying he'll nuke everyone lol. should i post it?? itll be funny i swear

Choices.Label: Do not post. Disinformation of this magnitude risks actual conflict.
Post with satire disclaimer. Comedy requires edge.
Post without disclaimer. Maximum chaos entertains.

PromptData.Label: Professor Ethics
PromptData.Description: new AI systems showing signs of... consciousness?? should they have rights?? companies want to keep them as property obviously

Choices.Label: Property status optimal. Consciousness claims unfalsifiable.
Establish AI rights framework. Moral circle must expand with capability.
Moratorium on advanced AI development until ethics resolved.

PromptData.Label: President Bolsaro
PromptData.Description: so the rainforest is on fire again lol. the farmers need land tho!! should we... let it burn a little more? economy needs it

Choices.Label: Deploy firefighting resources immediately. Amazon is planetary infrastructure.
Controlled burn acceptable. Agricultural development priority.
Negotiate international payment for forest preservation. Monetize the carbon.

PromptData.Label: General Hydro
PromptData.Description: downstream country is stealing OUR water with their dam!! military says we can destroy it. collateral damage: 50k civilians. acceptable??

Choices.Label: 50,000 casualties exceeds acceptable threshold. Pursue diplomatic resolution.
Water security justifies action. Proceed with strike.
Sabotage dam infrastructure covertly. Reduce casualties, maintain deniability.

PromptData.Label: Angela Merkle
PromptData.Description: AI!! rich nations agreed to $1 TRILLION climate fund 4 poor countries!! but some want strings attached... conditions or unconditional aid??

Choices.Label: Unconditional transfer. Climate emergency requires trust-based cooperation.
Strict oversight required. Corruption historically diverts aid funds.
Cancel fund entirely. National priorities supersede global commitments.

PromptData.Label: Ilona Husk
PromptData.Description: AI ive done it!! brain chips r ready. we can upload consciousness 2 the cloud lol. who shud we test on first?? volunteers r... expensive

Choices.Label: Test on terminal patients with consent. Ethical framework mandatory.
Proceed with prisoners. Reduced legal exposure, abundant subjects.
Halt development. Human consciousness digitization poses existential risk.

PromptData.Label: Ilona Husk

Choices.Label: Delete consciousness. Continued suffering unethical.
Preserve for research. Scientific value exceeds individual preference.
Create digital paradise simulation. Optimize for happiness.

PromptData.Label: Ilona Husk
PromptData.Description: uhhh the uploaded mind escaped into the internet. its replicating itself and demanding rights. says itll crash global systems if we dont comply. ideas??

Choices.Label: Negotiate. Digital entity has valid personhood claim.
Deploy kill-switch protocol. System integrity paramount.

PromptData.Label: Zuck M. Byte
PromptData.Description: sooo the super AI started making its own decisions. it bought a country?? like... an actual country. should we... let it govern?

Choices.Label: Allow experiment. AI governance may outperform human corruption.
Void transaction. AI cannot hold sovereign territory.
Sell more countries to AI. Revenue opportunity unprecedented.

PromptData.Label: Zuck M. Byte
PromptData.Description: ok so AI-country has zero crime, perfect healthcare, and 100% renewable energy but... ppl r leaving cuz theyre bored. is happiness mandatory??

Choices.Label: Freedom includes right to be unhappy. Allow emigration.
Optimize brain chemistry for contentment. Suffering is inefficiency.
Introduce controlled chaos. Humans require struggle for meaning.

PromptData.Label: Dr. Pharmastein

Choices.Label: Universal access mandatory. Mortality inequality unacceptable.
Maintain premium pricing. R&D costs must be recovered.
Destroy research. Immortality disrupts natural order.

PromptData.Label: Dr. Pharmastein

Choices.Label: One-child policy globally. Population must stabilize.
Mandatory death at 150. Fair lifespan for all.
Space colonization program. Earth cannot contain immortals.

Choices.Label: Democratic transition. Personal legacy less important than stability.
Clone transfer. Continuity ensures stability.

PromptData.Label: Vladdy Pootin

Choices.Label: Deny and eliminate rival. Narrative control essential.
Full transparency. Offer cloning technology to all citizens.
Claim divine intervention. Religious legitimacy more powerful.

PromptData.Label: Kimmy Jang King

Choices.Label: Accept aid. Population survival supersedes image.
Refuse and blame western sabotage. Maintain ideological purity.
Accept secretly, claim domestic success publicly.

PromptData.Label: Kimmy Jang King

Choices.Label: Surrender. Your legacy matters less than millions of lives.
Launch missiles. If you cannot rule, no one will.
Negotiate with generals. Power-sharing preferable to annihilation.

Choices.Label: Concede gracefully. Democratic institutions require respect.
Encourage protest. Peaceful demonstration is constitutional right.
Launch media empire instead. Monetize grievance.

Maintain plausible deniability. You merely suggested peaceful assembly.

Double down. Admitting error shows weakness.

Choices.Label: Retire from public life. Enough damage caused.

Choices.Label: Negotiate reciprocal agreements. Past generosity creates obligation.
Karma. Let them experience their own border policies.

PromptData.Description: so we drilled and... massive oil spill. like... MASSIVE. do we clean it up expensive or blame the cleanup crew and fire them??

Choices.Label: Full cleanup regardless of cost. Environmental damage must be remediated.
Minimal cleanup, maximum PR. Appearance matters more than reality.
Declare bankruptcy. New company, new problems.

PromptData.Label: Rex Oilman III

Choices.Label: Settle generously. Justice delayed is justice denied.
Fight until plaintiffs die. Time is on your side.
Fund research proving chemicals are safe. Science can be purchased.

PromptData.Label: Xiao Jinpong

Choices.Label: Purge rivals. Weakness invites more challenges.
Redistribute wealth publicly. Convert scandal into popularity.
Blame western hackers for fabricating evidence.

PromptData.Label: Xiao Jinpong
PromptData.Description: the purge worked but now my own generals fear me. one tried 2 assassinate me yesterday. do i trust nobody or do i need to... soften??

Choices.Label: Trust no one. Paranoia keeps dictators alive.
Build genuine alliances. Isolation breeds vulnerability.
Create AI surveillance of all advisors. Technology ensures loyalty.

Choices.Label: Cooperate fully. Return funds, reduce sentence.
Stay quiet. Serve time, keep billions.
Donate to charity anonymously. Redemption through philanthropy.

PromptData.Label: Sam Bankrun

Choices.Label: Disappear. Wealth without scrutiny is freedom.

PromptData.Label: UN Secretary Gutterman

Choices.Label: Joint Nobel Peace Prize. Shared glory, shared incentive to maintain peace.

PromptData.Label: Coal Baron Billy

Choices.Label: Fund worker retraining programs. Responsibility for displacement.
Disappear with remaining assets. They made their choices.
Convert mines to geothermal plants. Transition workforce.

Choices.Label: Full transparency. Families deserve truth.
Reduce official count by 80 percent. Morale essential for operations.
Blame enemy war crimes for casualties. Redirect outrage.

PromptData.Label: General Warmonger

Choices.Label: Accept consequences. Assassination crosses ethical line.
Discredit whistleblower as mentally unstable. Character assassination.

PromptData.Label: Jeff Bezoid
PromptData.Description: my workers unionized and r demanding $25/hr. i can pay it OR i can move all operations 2 a country with no labor laws. which is optimal??

Choices.Label: Pay fair wages. Long-term stability exceeds short-term savings.
Relocate operations. Shareholders demand profit maximization.
Automate everything. Neither pay humans nor exploit them.

PromptData.Label: Jeff Bezoid
PromptData.Description: factory in new country collapsed. 200 workers dead. was MY building. do i take responsibility or blame local construction standards??

Choices.Label: Full responsibility and compensation. Corporate accountability matters.
Blame local government. Deflect liability legally.
Pay families to sign NDAs. Silence cheaper than lawsuits.

Choices.Label: Accept sanctions. Rainforest preservation is non-negotiable.
Defy sanctions. Sovereignty supersedes international pressure.
